messages.title: Standing up for our community
messages.content: Hammersmith and Shepherds Bush have a special character. But the Tories' 'broken' economy is destroying them with cuts to our local police, fire, schools, and hospitals. We need facilities like hospitals and libraries, not more luxury flats.

messages.title: Working hard for everyone in Hammersmith and Shepherds Bush
messages.content: 25 years listening and getting things done.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Local unemployment has halved under Labour and is continuing to fall. Slaughter helped bring Westfield here that supports thousands of local jobs.
Labour is spending £200m on local school buildings. Helped get a new sixth form for Phoenix and £40m to build the Hammersmith Academy and garner more resources.

Improving NHS clinics and projects like the new GP’s Cancer Centre at Charing Cross Hospital have transformed the local NHS. Now you can see a cancer specialist within 2 weeks - a right the Tories would deny you.
Labour’s Safer Neighbourhood Teams mean more police on the streets for Hammersmith and Shepherds Bush. But Boris Johnson is cutting 455 officers in London.

issues.economy: Slaughter criticizes the Tories for a 'broken' economy with cuts to our local services.
issues.education: Labour spent £200m on local school buildings and Andy Slaughter helped establish new educational facilities.
issues.governance: Andy Slaughter seeks to continue his role as a local MP representing Labour, ensuring community voices are heard.
issues.health: Advocates for improved NHS services, with quick access to specialists and improvements at Charing Cross Hospital.

housing.content: The community needs facilities like hospitals and libraries, not more luxury flats, indicating concerns over housing developments not catering to public needs.

leaflet.personalStatement: I live here because I love the area and the people. I am proud of our community. Unlike the Tory and Lib Dem candidates I don't just visit in Hammersmith asking to be sent to local school the borough. It was home and it is home. I was born here, worked in local businesses, and attended local schools.

politicalExperience.achievements: Listening and getting things done for the local community.

endorsements.endorsement: I'm backing Andy. I was a member of the Tory party, and through my company a major donor for many years. But they don't stand for decency. That's for rich, and Andy Slaughter does. He's a superb MP and he's fighting my vote.

quotes.text: Hammersmith and Shepherds Bush have a special character.

images.caption: Andy Slaughter standing in front of the Hammersmith Bridge.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Slaughter emphasizes his local roots and dedication to community issues, contrasting himself with other candidates whom he accuses of not being as locally committed.
